评论详情: This dress is cute. I ordered the size recommended based on my bust size. That was the wrong thing to do as it is very big on me, about 2-3 sizes too big. Otherwise, this is a fun dress.

Ordered this because it was cute and I have an upcoming wild West/Westworld party. I know this is lolli, but I liked the look, construction, and thought it could work well and easily be styled in different directions.  I wasn't sure if sizing, but am glad I went a size up. The dress is easy to cinch and adjust with all the ribbons and back tie, but I do think it is true to us sizing. The seams and zipper look much better than anything I could pull off and like the dress is not a throwaway. I like that some of the accents are removable. To get the most impact, you need a petticoat under to poof it out, but the underlayers kind of work to poof it a little bit.  In all this is a cute and well constructed costume or cosplay or base for any adjacent look you are working for.
Excelente se compró para mi hija que es muy delgada se ajusta muy bien
